text:
@Talkmaster We’re here and thriving honeyyyyy. 

And we’re also in the front lines helping with this pandemic, alongside our non-Muslim American peers. Keep that in mind as you or your loved ones interface and benefit from Muslim health professionals, Muslim COVID19 researchers, etc
